title: Bachelorette Parties, Bridal Showers & Weddings....Oh My!
itunes:title: Bachelorette Parties, Bridal Showers & Weddings....Oh My!
itunes:subtitle: Hangovers, lost NuvaRings and so much more
description:
This week we're talking all things related to bachelorette parties, bridal showers and weddings. When did we decide it was ok to do a multiple day bachelorette party? When the HELL did weddings get so expensive? And what's the deal with diamond rings? Were we really bamboozled into decades of desiring diamonds due to a marketing ploy? Come join us this week as we walk you through some traditional yays and nays including hangovers, lost Nuvarings, semen in your hair and much more!


Basic Bitch Quickies this week:

  • Joe Millionaire's Steven was Spoon Fed until 11
  • Adele Cancels her Vegas Residency
  • Britney Spears & Jamie Lynn Ongoing Feud


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
